pageContext.claim: “He [Biden] didn't do a thing. Now, all of a sudden, in years where he was never considered smart, but now he's really not considered as smart. And now all of a sudden he's going to do what he never did in 47 years. He's going to do this and that and everything that I'm doing, everything that we're doing.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump sometimes accused Biden of copying all his plans. Nevermind that Trump at other points claimed Biden was a socialist who would destroy American society with radical policies. The fact is Biden campaigned on reversing many of Trump's policies.
